Constructors

ImmediateRenderer(GraphicsDevice, OutputDescription, Effect?, uint)

Initializes a new instance of the ImmediateRenderer class with the specified graphics device, output, effect, and capacity.

public ImmediateRenderer(GraphicsDevice graphicsDevice, OutputDescription output, Effect? effect = null, uint capacity = 30720)

Parameters

graphicsDevice GraphicsDevice

The graphics device used for rendering.

output OutputDescription

The output description for rendering.

effect Effect

An optional effect (shader) to use; if null, the default immediate renderer effect is used.

capacity uint

The maximum number of vertices that can be batched. Defaults to 30720.

Properties

Capacity

Gets the maximum number of vertices that can be batched.

public uint Capacity { get; }

Property Value

uint

Effect

Gets the effect (shader) used for rendering.

public Effect Effect { get; }

Property Value

Effect

GraphicsDevice

Gets the graphics device used for rendering.

public GraphicsDevice GraphicsDevice { get; }

Property Value

GraphicsDevice

Output

Gets the output description used for rendering.

public OutputDescription Output { get; }

Property Value

OutputDescription

Methods

Begin(CommandList, BlendState?)

Begins the rendering process by setting up the command list and pipeline state.

public void Begin(CommandList commandList, BlendState? blendState = null)

Parameters

commandList CommandList

The command list used for recording rendering commands.

blendState BlendState

An optional blend state; if null, the default alpha blend state is used.

Exceptions

Exception

Thrown if the renderer has already begun.

Dispose(bool)

Disposes of the object and releases associated resources.

protected override void Dispose(bool disposing)

Parameters

disposing bool

True if called from user code; false if called from a finalizer.

DrawCube(Transform, Vector3, Color?)

Draws a cube with the specified transformation, size, and optional color.

public void DrawCube(Transform transform, Vector3 size, Color? color = null)

Parameters

transform Transform

The transformation to be applied to the cube.

size Vector3

The size of the cube in 3D space.

color Color?

An optional color for the cube; if null, white is used.

DrawCubeWires(Transform, Vector3, Color?)

Draws the wireframe of a cube with the specified transform, size, and optional color.

public void DrawCubeWires(Transform transform, Vector3 size, Color? color = null)

Parameters

transform Transform

The transformation to apply to the cube, which includes position, rotation, and scale.

size Vector3

The dimensions of the cube to draw.

color Color?

An optional color for the wireframe. If null, the default color is white.

DrawCylinder() 

public void DrawCylinder()

DrawCylinderWires() 

public void DrawCylinderWires()

DrawGird(Transform, int, int, Color?)

Renders a grid using the specified transformation matrix, slice count, spacing, and optional color.

public void DrawGird(Transform transform, int slices, int spacing, Color? color = null)

Parameters

transform Transform

The transformation applied to the grid.

slices int

The number of divisions (slices) in the grid. Must be greater than or equal to 1.

spacing int

The distance (spacing) between each grid line. Must be greater than or equal to 1.

color Color?

An optional color for the grid lines. Defaults to white if not specified.

DrawHemisphere(Transform, float, int, int, Color?)

Renders a 3D hemisphere with the specified transformation, radius, rings, slices, and optional color.

public void DrawHemisphere(Transform transform, float radius, int rings, int slices, Color? color = null)

Parameters

transform Transform

The transformation to apply to the hemisphere.

radius float

The radius of the hemisphere.

rings int

The number of rings used to construct the hemisphere. Must be 3 or greater.

slices int

The number of slices used to construct the hemisphere. Must be 3 or greater.

color Color?

An optional color to apply to the hemisphere. If null, the default color will be white.

DrawHemisphereWires(Transform, float, int, int, Color?)

Draws the wireframe outline of a hemisphere using the specified transformation, radius, number of rings, and slices.

public void DrawHemisphereWires(Transform transform, float radius, int rings, int slices, Color? color = null)

Parameters

transform Transform

The transformation to apply to the hemisphere.

radius float

The radius of the hemisphere.

rings int

The number of horizontal subdivisions (rings) for the hemisphere.

slices int

The number of vertical subdivisions (slices) for the hemisphere.

color Color?

An optional color for the hemisphere. If null, the color defaults to white.

DrawLine(Vector3, Vector3, Color?)

Draws a line between two points in 3D space with an optional color.

public void DrawLine(Vector3 startPos, Vector3 endPos, Color? color = null)

Parameters

startPos Vector3

The starting position of the line in 3D space.

endPos Vector3

The ending position of the line in 3D space.

color Color?

The optional color of the line. If null, the default color is white.

DrawSphere(Transform, float, int, int, Color?)

Draws a sphere with the specified transformation, radius, number of rings, slices, and optional color.

public void DrawSphere(Transform transform, float radius, int rings, int slices, Color? color = null)

Parameters

transform Transform

The transformation to be applied to the sphere.

radius float

The radius of the sphere.

rings int

The number of horizontal subdivisions of the sphere.

slices int

The number of vertical subdivisions of the sphere.

color Color?

An optional color for the sphere; defaults to white.

DrawSphereWires(Transform, float, int, int, Color?)

Draws the wireframe of a sphere with the given transform, radius, number of rings, slices, and optional color.

public void DrawSphereWires(Transform transform, float radius, int rings, int slices, Color? color = null)

Parameters

transform Transform

The transformation to apply to the sphere (position, rotation, and scaling).

radius float

The radius of the sphere.

rings int

The number of horizontal subdivisions of the sphere.

slices int

The number of vertical subdivisions of the sphere.

color Color?

An optional color for the wireframe; defaults to white.

DrawVertices(Transform, List<ImmediateVertex3D>, List<uint>, PrimitiveTopology)

Draws a set of vertices using the specified transformation, vertex data, indices, and topology.

public void DrawVertices(Transform transform, List<ImmediateVertex3D> vertices, List<uint> indices, PrimitiveTopology topology)

Parameters

transform Transform

The transformation matrix to apply to the vertices.

vertices List<ImmediateVertex3D>

The list of vertices to be rendered.

indices List<uint>

The list of indices defining the order in which the vertices are connected.

topology PrimitiveTopology

The primitive topology specifying how the vertices are interpreted (e.g., triangle list, line strip).

End()

Ends the rendering process, flushing any remaining batched geometry.

public void End()

Exceptions

Exception

Thrown if the renderer has not begun rendering.

SetTexture(Texture2D?, Sampler?)

Sets the current texture and sampler to be used for rendering.

public void SetTexture(Texture2D? texture, Sampler? sampler = null)

Parameters

texture Texture2D

The texture to use; if null, the default immediate renderer texture is used.

sampler Sampler

The sampler to use; if null, a default point sampler is used.
